message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. That's the highest I can go.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,200 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $8,700. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $8,700 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8,000. That's the lowest I can go.
